com.paydiant.android.common.util

Class PaymentAccountUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.common.util.PaymentAccountUtils

  • public class PaymentAccountUtils
extends Object
    PaymentAccountUtils class contains a collection of commonly used methods handling functionalities of payment instruments.
    Since:
    3.9.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant

      • PaymentAccountUtils

    • Method Detail

      • cacheDefaultPaymentAccount

        public static boolean cacheDefaultPaymentAccount(Context context,
                                 PaymentAccount paymentAccount)
        Stores the paymentAccount as the default account, that can be utilized by various payment instrument related operations such as Auto pay. Due to the nature of sensitive data contained in the paymentAccount object, this method will store the default account information as an identifier. Stored payment instrument can be retrieved using the retrieveDefaultPaymentAccount(Context, List) method.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        paymentAccount - Payment Instrument that needs to be cached as default
        Returns:
        true on successful caching, false otherwise.

      • cacheDefaultPaymentAccountData

        public static boolean cacheDefaultPaymentAccountData(Context context,
                                     PaymentAccountData paymentAccountData)
        Stores the paymentAccountData as the default account, that can be utilized by various payment instrument related operations such as Auto pay. Due to the nature of sensitive data contained in the paymentAccountData object, this method will store the default account information as an identifier. Stored payment instrument can be retrieved using the retrieveDefaultPaymentAccountData(Context, List) method.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        paymentAccountData - Payment Instrument that needs to be cached as default
        Returns:
        true on successful caching, false otherwise.

      • retrieveDefaultPaymentAccount

        public static PaymentAccount retrieveDefaultPaymentAccount(Context context,
                                           List<? extends PaymentAccount> paymentAccounts)
        Selects and returns the cached payment instrument from the provided list of paymentAccounts.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        paymentAccounts - List of payment instruments available for the current user
        Returns:
        The cached payment instrument if its being successfully cached through the cacheDefaultPaymentAccount(Context, PaymentAccount) method, otherwise returns null.
        See Also:
        cacheDefaultPaymentAccount(Context, PaymentAccount)

      • retrieveDefaultPaymentAccountData

        public static PaymentAccountData retrieveDefaultPaymentAccountData(Context context,
                                                   List<? extends PaymentAccountData> paymentAccountDataList)
        Selects and returns the cached payment instrument from the provided list of paymentAccountData.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        paymentAccountDataList - List of payment instruments available for the current user
        Returns:
        The cached payment instrument if its being successfully cached through the cacheDefaultPaymentAccountData(Context, PaymentAccountData) method, otherwise returns null.
        See Also:
        cacheDefaultPaymentAccountData(Context, PaymentAccountData)

      • removeCachedDefaultPaymentAccount

        public static boolean removeCachedDefaultPaymentAccount(Context context)
        Removes cached payment instrument information.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        Returns:
        true if successfully removed a cached payment instrument, false otherwise.
